debt_section: As of December 31, 2023, Salesforce, Inc. had total debt of $8,024 million. The company's leverage ratio was 1.33x EBITDA. Management remains committed to maintaining investment-grade credit ratings and strong liquidity.
earnings_excerpt: Salesforce, Inc. reported strong results for fiscal year 2023. Operating margin was 18.2%, reflecting continued focus on operational efficiency. Management provided guidance for continued growth in the coming year.
